refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A complete book. This is probably the most common document starting point in DocBook documents. The content model of Book was made dramatically less restrictive in DocBook V3.1.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Generally causes a forced page break, restarts page numbering, and may generate additional front and back matter (tables of contents and indexes, for example) automatically. In a Set, Book almost always begins on the next available recto page.
The input order of major components is taken to be the desired output order.
